Title: Object: The death of Abercrombie
Description: Sir Ralph Abercromby, mortally wounded on the battlefield in Egypt in 1801, helped down from his horse by two soldiers at right, one stepping on a fallen standard, as another takes his sword from his side, watched by a soldier standing by his horse at left, another kneeling in the foreground at right; trimmed above title. 1805 Engraving and etching
Associated events: Associated Event: Napoleonic Wars (Second Battle of Abukir) 1801
